means: 不按个人道德标准进行评定的，不偏不倚的，客观的

list.abs: the single most important rule is to be nonjudgmental .唯一的最重要原则是不带偏见。
the single most important rule is to be nonjudgmental唯一重要的原则是切忌主观臆断

means.word_mean: 1. refraining from making judgments especially ones based on personal opinions or standards;

auth_sentence.content: But we're also fairly nonjudgmental, because that would be presumptuous.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we're also fairly nonjudgmental, because that would be presumptuous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we're also fairly nonjudgmental, because that would be presumptuous.

auth_sentence.content: Research is showing that this gentle, nonjudgmental approach helps individuals bounce back even after major crises.
auth_sentence.res_content: Research is showing that this gentle, nonjudgmental approach helps individuals bounce back even after major crises.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Research is showing that this gentle, nonjudgmental approach helps individuals bounce back even after major crises.

auth_sentence.content: If things do not work out well for her, she needs to have you as her nonjudgmental friend and for unconditional support.
auth_sentence.res_content: If things do not work out well for her, she needs to have you as her nonjudgmental friend and for unconditional support.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If things do not work out well for her, she needs to have you as her nonjudgmental friend and for unconditional support.
